Articles.Content:
Hi there,

I'm trying to install a range of graphics mods through CKAN, and have run into a few issues. 

Essentially, CKAN keeps indicating that downloads from spacedock.info are failing. It then tries to download them from archive.org and eventually the whole program crashes...I can manually download the mods from the domains myself, but then I'm struggling to make sense of how to install Spectra manually and ensure it runs correctly. I tried to follow a video from 2018 (linked below) to install it, but it seems things have changed since then and the current advice from the mod creator is to install with CKAN...

So, I'm wanting to know how I can either fix things with CKAN, or get some guidance on the manual install side of things. I understand you have to drag and drop the files into Gamedata, but when it comes to the 'extras' that Spectra has I don't think I've installed them correctly manually.  When I have attempted a manual install, I don't get clouds generating despite having EVE installed, and I tried to drag and drop the 'Spectra_EVE' clouds file to no avail...so I'm guessing I'm not doing that quite right regarding where I'm dropping them? Also, the sun looked like a blob when I manually installed, which indicates again I didn't do the 'extras' quite right...

Any support would be appreciated!

Well, after about 20 plus attempts at downloading on Ckan it finally worked! Fortunately it seems to store the progress of downloads so it chunked up the downloads after each crash...but we got there in the end. 

 

I checked the structure of the files to manually install the mods and I was way off...so good thing Ckan came thru in the end. 

 

Mods, feel free to delete this post - I couldn't find the option to do it myself
